summary: This bill, the Foreign Service Voluntary Early Retirement Authority Act of 2025, modifies voluntary retirement requirements for members of the Foreign Service. It introduces a provision allowing eligible participants, particularly those affected by workforce restructuring or identified as surplus, to retire early and receive an annuity. The bill also addresses funding for these benefits and includes a Sense of Congress regarding health care benefits for retirees. It applies retroactively to separations starting January 20, 2025.
